note.p: Death: Bruce Grove, Tottenham, Middlesex (21 March 1864)
Career: Set up in business as a chemist, London (1793); in partnership with William Allen (FRS 1807) (1796-1803); corresponded with Goethe on meteorology
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1865 vol 14 pp x-xii
References: A W Slater, 'Luke Howard, FRS (1772-1864) and his Relations with Goethe' in NR 1972-3 vol 27 pp 119-140
